items.name: Seerowpedia
items.title: Seerowpedia
items.headline: Welcome to the Seerowpedia!
items.desc: Welcome to the Animorphs wiki, Seerowpedia. Animorphs is an English language science fiction young adult book series written by K. A. Applegate (Katherine Alice Applegate) and published by Scholastic. The first book of the series was published in 1996. Animorphs is the third-most successful children's book series of all time, after Harry Potter and Goosebumps.
